ygData.subject: Re: an Idea
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen this bug in relation to Ogres and Trolls but I have yet to see this same effect occur with Gnomish Enchanters or other smaller races using a guise
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen this bug in relation to Ogres and Trolls but I have yet to see
this same effect occur with Gnomish Enchanters or other smaller races
using a guise of the deceiver. That's not to say it's possible - just
that I haven't seen it.

The next time I'm in Ak'anon (I'm in Steamfont right now), I'll go visit
the king and wait until he starts to cast spells to see if his illusion
wears off. I should be online within the next few days and I'll report
then

QdP

--- Eric Kenslow <eric@...> wrote:
> There's a known bug with illusions where if you zone in after someone
> has
> cast an illusion, that person will appear to be their normal height no
> matter what their illusion is. Typically you see this in dungeons where
> an
> ogre (troll/barbarian) uses a guise of the deceiver to make himself into
> a
> dark elf that's ogre height.
